alert.note: Alert for Southern Black Hills (South Dakota) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS RapidCity (Western South Dakota and Northeastern Wyoming)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued August 23 at 5:00PM MDT by NWS RapidCity
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of south central Custer County through 530 PM MDT... At 459 PM MDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm 3 miles northwest of Pringle, or 8 miles south of Custer, moving southeast at 15 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 30 mph and pea to penny size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. This strong thunderstorm will be near... Pringle around 515 PM MDT. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.75 IN MAX WIND GUST...30 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. Torrential rainfall is also occurring with this storm and may lead to localized flooding. Do not drive your vehicle through flooded roadways.
